title: Bullet Gal: It's Not You, It's Me
description: Teenage gunsel-cum-aspiring-hero Mitzi (last name unknown) breezes into Heropa with twin 9mm pistols blazing, only to be targeted for recruitment, assassination and betrayal.Andrez Bergen aces it in this loving homage to hardboiled noir, detective stories, sci-fi and pulp fiction... along with the men and women that don union suits to tackle crimeâ€”and end up fighting each other."It's a universe that's being constructed and then simultaneously deconstructed... a revelation." (THE COMICS ALTERNATIVE)
author: Andrez Bergen
